name: Heavy Turbolaser battery
Lore: 'Built to penetrate the armor of the toughest Star Destroyers. Cooling technology pilfered from the Empire.',
Text: 'Use 4 Force to deploy on your Star Cruiser (or Star Destroyer). Adds 2 to power. May target a starship using 2 Force. Draw two destiny. Subtract 1 when targeting a capital starship. Otherwise, subtract 6. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.',
